thread.title: Wine expert to experience state's vintage
thread.title_full: Wine expert to experience state's vintage

title: Wine expert to experience state's vintage
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Wine expert to experience state's vin... Wine expert to experience state's vintage Next Story Prev Story 24 min ago Read more: Examiner 
ONE of only three master sommeliers in Australia will taste his way through some on the state's best wine on Saturday. Epicurean Adventure Tasmania director Cade Smith will show master somelier Sebastian Crowther quality wine being produced in Tasmania. Start the conversation, or Read more at Examiner.
